general.registrationInstructions: First, you need to identify the course you want to study, then fill in all the information in the registration form and click 'Register Now'. After submitting the information, please check your email regularly to receive notifications about tuition payments and study methods, or you can scan the QR code at the bottom of the page to contact a consultant.
general.mission: Enhance digital capabilities for Vietnamese people through practical AI application training, helping students confidently apply it immediately to their work and life.
general.coreValues: Pioneering applied AI training using the exclusive StepUp method.
general.practicalTraining: Focus on practical training – Study 1 session, practice 5 days. Output commitment with a practical ratio of 80% - 90%.
general.whenCompleted: You will be awarded a certificate of course completion when you achieve 80/100 points on the course's graduation project.

offices: HCMC Office: 897 Hoang Sa, Ward 11, District 3, HCMC
Da Lat Office: 5 Nam Ky Khoi Nghia, Ward 01, Da Lat City
Lam Ha Office: Phuc Hung Hamlet, Tan Ha Commune, Lam Ha District

introduction: AICT Academy – Pioneering Applied Artificial Intelligence
Each student has a personal graduation project, demonstrating their application of AI.
targetLearners: Businesses needing to enhance staff capabilities with AI
State agencies, government organizations applying AI to administrative reform
Associations, business clubs wanting to elevate technology
Teachers, especially preschool, primary, and secondary school teachers
Students, future AI trainers, AI mentors
Groups of individuals aged 20 or older who want to learn AI

studentFeedback.name: Nguyen Minh Tri, Marketing Specialist
studentFeedback.description: Before the course, I was completely clueless about AI. But after 3 days of studying with Suri Technologies' instructors, I not only understood the foundational concepts but also learned how to apply AI to real-world tasks like creating chatbots, analyzing data, and optimizing marketing processes.

studentFeedback.name: Tran Thi Lan, Online Shop Owner in Da Lat
studentFeedback.description: The most impressive part was the practical session on building an AI chatbot. I was able to create a demo AI Agent for my small business in just a few hours. The course is truly valuable for anyone looking to start their digital transformation journey.

studentFeedback.name: Pham Quoc Huy, Office Worker
studentFeedback.description: The course was well-organized, materials were complete, and instructors provided enthusiastic support both during and after the session. I especially liked the part about applying ChatGPT to office work, very practical!

faq.question: What do I need to prepare before studying?
faq.answer: You don't need a deep technology background or to be an IT person. The course is designed for beginners, only requiring basic logical thinking and a willingness to learn. The content is built clearly, easy to understand, guiding you step-by-step for easy access.

faq.question: Do I need to know programming beforehand?
faq.answer: Programming knowledge is not mandatory. The course has multiple levels: beginners will learn through visual examples and drag-and-drop tools to understand principles without writing code. Those with a technical background will learn advanced sections with detailed guidance using programming code, helping to deepen their knowledge.

faq.question: Can I try a demo before registering?
faq.answer: Yes, you can try some initial lectures for free. This helps you experience the teaching style, course content, and practical applicability before deciding to officially register.

faq.question: How is this course different from free videos online?
faq.answer: The course has a systematic roadmap, from basic to advanced, avoiding rambling. You get to practice applying it directly to your work, receive support from instructors or mentors when encountering difficulties, and the content is always updated with the latest trends in the AI field, ensuring up-to-date knowledge.
